name: Monster Truck Stunts Tracks
description:
Monster Truck Stunts Tracks is for those people who love performing high level monster truck stunts, fast driving with nitro, dangerous turns on stunt ramp and multiple asphalt hurdles. Extreme stunt challenge begins with and extra dose of amazing monster trucks nitro and GT racing trucks games. Go against STUNT RAMP, car smashing, high jump, speed racing and drift racing in amazing monster trucks games.
Features:
• Mid-air monster truck tracks
• Monster truck zigzag tracks on big height
• Featuring new 4x4 monster truck 3d graphics
• Endless journey
